doc:
Jennifer Beals https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jennifer_Beals 0 Jennifer Beals (born December 19, 1963) is an American actress and a former teen model. She made her film debut in 1980's My Bodyguard, before receiving critical acclaim for her role in Flashdance (1983), for which she won NAACP Image Award for Actress and was nominated for a Golden Globe Award for Best Actress - Motion Picture Comedy or Musical. Beals appeared in several notable films including Devil in a Blue Dress (1995), The Last Days of Disco (1998), Roger Dodger (2002), The Book of Eli (2010) and Before I Fall (2017). She starred as Bette Porter on the Showtime drama series The L Word (2004-2009). She later went on to star in the series The Chicago Code (2011), Proof (2015) and Taken (2017). Jennifer_Beals ( born December_19_,_1963 ) is an_American_actress and a_former_teen_model . She made her_film_debut in 1980 's_My_Bodyguard , before receiving critical_acclaim for her_role in Flashdance_(_1983_) , for which she won NAACP_Image_Award for Actress and was_nominated for a_Golden_Globe_Award for_Best_Actress - Motion_Picture_Comedy_or_Musical . Beals appeared in several_notable_films including Devil in a_Blue_Dress_(_1995_) , The_Last_Days of Disco_(_1998_) , Roger_Dodger_(_2002_) , The_Book of Eli_(_2010_) and Before I Fall (_2017_) . She starred as Bette_Porter on the_Showtime_drama_series The_L_Word ( 2004-2009_) . She later went on to_star in the_series The_Chicago_Code_(_2011_) , Proof_(_2015_) and Taken (_2017_) .
